rescue_trapped_entity.title: The Trapped Delegate
rescue_trapped_entity.description: Following the distress coordinates leads you to a collapsed section where you find Delegate Sage, barely conscious and trapped by fallen crystals. 'You... you found me,' she whispers. 'I discovered the truth... the conspiracy... they tried to silence me but I escaped here. The Architect... they're not just disrupting trade... they want to collapse everything...'

choices.text: 'Let me get you out of here first, then you can tell me everything.'
'Tell me about this Architect while I work to free you.'
'How did you end up down here?'
'The other delegates - are they also trapped somewhere?'
